Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone showing how two students use it to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate the string or other materials used in the telephone that allow sound to travel from one cup to another.
The student can show that the device uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can describe in their drawing how using such a device helps people communicate over distances.
The student can depict the basic structure of the device using only the materials specified (e.g., cups, string).
